    public class AdorneHubHandler
extends org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.BaseBridgeHandler
implements AdorneHubChangeHandler
    The AdorneHubHandler is responsible for handling commands for the Adorne Hub.### clarify not handling commands
